channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Power Monitoring Expert (PME)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- EcoStruxure Power Monitoring Expert (PME)

item.title: CVE-2024-9005|2024-10-08T13:46:49.267Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert%20%28pme%29
item.description: CWE-502: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability exists that could allow code to be remotely executed on the server when unsafely deserialized data is posted to the web server.
